physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Abrasions over the left frontal scalp, with minimal soft-tissue swelling and no ecchymoses.
Irritability, decreased interaction and smiling; length 55 cm (<3rd percentile), weight 5.0 kg (<3rd percentile), increased muscle tone, perirectal abscess.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Worsening signs of irritability and decreased interaction noted.

physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Somnolent but easily aroused, irritable but consolable. Fluctuant mass consistent with abscess on medial left gluteus.
Lumbar puncture showed light pink and slightly turbid cerebrospinal fluid (CSF), 3090 red cells, 1 white cell per cubic millimeter; high protein level, normal glucose.
